Articles.Content:
My dad enjoys using this.

"Never let the things you can't do, stop you from doing what you can.” Hmm. Can't find the original person though... Tons of people have referenced before.

“Over Macho Grande?” - Airplane 2

Also:

4 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

 

“Over Macho Grande?” - Airplane 2

 

I’ll never get over Macho Grande

Zeus: Why you keep calling me Jésus? I look Puerto Rican to you?

John McClane: Guy back there called you Jésus.

Zeus: He didn't say Jésus. He said, "Hey, Zeus!" My name is Zeus.

John McClane: Zeus?

Zeus: Yeah, Zeus! As in, father of Apollo? Mt. Olympus? Don't [mess] with me or I'll shove a lightning bolt up your S? Zeus! You got a problem with that?

John McClane: No, I don't have a problem with that.

meta quote:

"Any fool can know, the point is to understand" - Albert Einstein
"Too bad Buddy, this twisted game needs a reset. We'll start over with this V2 and entrust the Future with the next generation" - Pixy (at least that's what i remember from the line)

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF

-My Cat Emy (who is actually a human so nobody can say that only humans are allowed)(just kidding, just a normal cat) after I pick her up outside but she wants to kill small shrews and little birds and stare at the neighbors cats who illegaly invaded her territory

“Now I did leap into the void intentionally here because I want to see, if I respawn in Rodoroc I might honestly punch my computer screen. [You are now entering Thesead] This is even WORS-“

Shots, 2019

Spoiler

Now that I think about it, I should put that in my signature

 

Edited January 27, 2021 by Fraston

"The syllabus is both useful as a weapon and as a source of knowledge."

- A fellow NYLT course instructor

Here

No, we are analagus to the sleeping bear my dear friend, for we are awaiting something much greater than just simply the words of a great author. For we await the great author's next masterpiece. Their next Mona Lisa, their next big painting, a pure work of art.

Edited January 28, 2021 by Mikenike
Quote placed

On 1/23/2021 at 7:12 PM, StrandedonEarth said:

Zeus: Why you keep calling me Jésus? I look Puerto Rican to you?

I died at this.

On 1/22/2021 at 8:35 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

“Over Macho Grande?” - Airplane 2

Roger Murdock: Flight 2-0-9er, you are cleared for take-off.
Captain Oveur: Roger!
Roger Murdock: Huh?
Tower: L.A. departure frequency, 123 point 9’er.
Captain Oveur: Roger!
Roger Murdock: Huh?
Victor Basta: Request vector, over.
Captain Oveur: What?
Tower: Flight 2-0-9er cleared for vector 324.
Roger Murdock: We have clearance, Clarence.
Captain Oveur: Roger, Roger. What’s our vector, Victor?
Tower: Tower’s radio clearance, over!
Captain Oveur: That’s Clarence Oveur. Over.
Tower: Over.
Captain Oveur: Roger.
Roger Murdock: Huh?
Tower voice: Roger, over!
Roger Murdock: What?
Captain Oveur: Huh?
Victor Basta: Who?

 

Rumack: You’d better tell the Captain we’ve got to land as soon as we can. This woman has to be gotten to a hospital.
Elaine Dickinson: A hospital? What is it?
Rumack: It’s a big building with patients, but that’s not important right now.

 

Steve McCroskey: Looks like I picked the wrong week to quit drinking.

Steve McCroskey: Looks like I picked the wrong week to quit smoking.

Steve McCroskey: Looks like I picked the wrong week to quit sniffing glue.

 

Controller: Bad news. The fog’s getting thicker.
Johnny: [jumps to an overweight controller] And Leon is getting laaaarger.

^^^^^^Airplane^^^^^^

"I'll Be Back"- Arnold S. in Terminator

1. “May the Force be with you.” -Star Wars, 1977

2. “There's no place like home.” -The Wizard of Oz, 1939

3. “I'm the king of the world!” -Titanic, 1997

4. “Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.” -Dead Poets Society, 1989

5. “Elementary, my dear Watson.” -The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes, 1939

6. “It's alive! It's alive!” -Frankenstein, 1931

7. “My mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.” -Forrest Gump, 1994

8. “I'll be back.” -The Terminator, 1984

9. “You're gonna need a bigger boat.” -Jaws, 1975

10. “Here's looking at you, kid.” -Casablanca,1942

11. “My precious.” -The Lord of the Rings: Two Towers, 2002

12. “Houston, we have a problem.” -Apollo 13, 1995

13. “There's no crying in baseball!” -A League of Their Own, 1992

14. “E.T. phone home.” -E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial, 1982

15. “You can't handle the truth!” -A Few Good Men, 1992

16. “A martini. Shaken, not stirred.” -Goldfinger, 1964

17. “Life is a banquet, and most poor suckers are starving to death!” -Auntie Mame, 1958

18. “If you build it, he will come.” -Field of Dreams, 1989

19. “The stuff that dreams are made of.” -The Maltese Falcon, 1941

20. “Magic Mirror on the wall, who is the fairest one of all?" -Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, 1937

21. “Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.” -The Godfather Part II, 1974

22. “I am your father.” -Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back, 1980

23. “Just keep swimming.” -Finding Nemo, 2003

24. “Today, I consider myself the luckiest man on the face of the earth.” -The Pride of the Yankees, 1942

25. “You is kind. You is smart. You is important.” -The Help, 2011

26. “What we've got here is failure to communicate.” -Cool Hand Luke, 1967

27. “Hasta la vista, baby.” -Terminator 2: Judgment Day, 1991

28. “You don't understand! I coulda had class. I coulda been a contender. I could've been somebody, instead of a bum, which is what I am.” -On the Waterfront, 1954

29. "Bond. James Bond." -Dr. No, 1962

30. “You talking to me?” -Taxi Driver, 1976

31. “Roads? Where we're going we don't need roads.” -Back to the Future, 1985

32. “That'll do, pig. That'll do.” -Babe, 1995

33. “I'm walking here! I'm walking here!” -Midnight Cowboy, 1969

34. "It was beauty killed the beast." -King Kong, 1933

35. “Stella! Hey, Stella!” -A Streetcar Named Desire, 1951

36. "As if!" -Clueless, 1995

37. “Here's Johnny!” -The Shining, 1980

38. “Rosebud.” -Citizen Kane, 1941

39. “I'll have what she's having.” -When Harry Met Sally, 1989

40. “Inconceivable!” -The Princess Bride, 1987

41. “All right, Mr. DeMille, I'm ready for my close-up.” -Sunset Boulevard, 1950

42. “Fasten your seatbelts. It's going to be a bumpy night.” -All About Eve, 1950

43. “Nobody puts Baby in a corner.” -Dirty Dancing, 1987

44. “Well, nobody's perfect.” -Some Like it Hot, 1959

45. “Snap out of it!” -Moonstruck, 1987

46. “You had me at ‘hello.’" -Jerry Maguire, 1996

47. "They may take our lives, but they'll never take our freedom!" -Braveheart, 1995

48. “To infinity and beyond!” -Toy Story, 1995

49. “You’re killin’ me, Smalls.” -The Sandlot, 1993

50. “Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.” -The Wizard of Oz, 1939

"And with that, we're gonna  wrap up today's webcast, thanks for logging on and watching, and we'll be back with another Starship in the near future."

- SpaceX webcaster after the SN9 flight.
Selling guns is like selling vacuum cleaner- Nick Cage, in God of War.

All grandiloloquent sentence of Legolas.

And: 

I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.

Elon Musk.
Go ahead, make my day
Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
And Now for Something Completely Different

5 minutes ago, DialoMalison said:

It's ...

One of those days, again:

"Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe."

Life is a pretty unpleasant affair at times.

"That's what we call ROOKIE NUMBERS."- Graystillplays

"But what is grief, if not love persevering" - The Vision (WandaVision, Episode 8)

 

Never expected a MCU TV "sitcom" staring a magical wife and her robot husband, to hit so hard in the feels.
no monkey ever reheated a frozen burrito.
"I'm insane and you are my insanity." -- James Cole
